nodes.text: The ZX-10 Combat Droid was an advanced model of battle droid developed by Czerka Corporation at their research moon CZ-198. Rasmus Blys had the line fitted with a tamper-proof security system that completely deactivated any sliced units, forcing the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire to destroy the ZX-10s still in their pods during the fighting at CZ-198.

The ZX-10 Combat Droids are an enemy added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as part of Game Update 2.3. The ZX-10 droids are the subject of a Daily mission in CZ-198: Droid Demolition for Imperial players and Manual Shutdown for Republic players.
